column8: I wonder how to join UN, i am interested to help the world in any capacity.i thin its cool to join UN, but the application seems difficult.any Malaysian successfully join uN?
Can ask Sha91. I think she is an ambassador for one or their wings
can try call my fren kofi anney. he bancuh kopi at maulana maju

applied before, in dept to maintain carbon monoxide release in asian region. fucked up during interview as i know i wont be taking the job. they will treat u like volunteer worker, salary so-so only. forgot already where i found the job, either jobstreet or newspaper
It's a fixed term contract, follow international law, therefore local public holiday not counted. Benefit is salary tax free

column7: From: Church of the Flying Spaghetti Monster
column8: I dunno about working for the UN itself but its possible to apply for a job in one of their agencies. UNCHR, UNESCO, etc. You need to have the right qualifications though. Their website advertises vacancies in each country. You can try to apply. Think you have to write in directly.
how much is the salary?ok thankshow did he join ?u working for UN?
